title: Employers have cut 1.1 million jobs this year. Here's why.
description: Job cuts so far this year are at their highest levels since 2020, new report says.
content: Employers have cut more than 1.1 million jobs through November of this year, the most since 2020, when companies laid off 2.2 million workers during the pandemic, according to a new report from outpl… [+2915 chars]
